Description: Fragment of foot and wall of black-glazed, pottery stamped bowl. Dip-glazed; stand ring and underside reserved. Stacking ring on floor. Triangular palmettes and rouletting on floor. Incised inscription on wall.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 616)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.056)
